name: BindingDB
description: A public, web-accessible database of measured binding affinities, focusing chiefly on the interactions of proteins considered to be candidate drug-targets with ligands that are small, drug-like molecules
full_citation: Liu T, Hwang L, Burley SK, Nitsche CI, Southan C, Walters WP, Gilson MK. BindingDB in 2024: a FAIR knowledgebase of protein-small molecule binding data. Nucleic Acids Res. 2025 Jan 6;53(D1):D1633-D1644. doi: 10.1093/nar/gkae1075. PMID: 39574417; PMCID: PMC11701568.
